question_stem: A study to estimate the mean acreage of farms in a country is conducted. The study targets to obtain a 95% confidence interval with a margin of error of 25 acres. How many farms should be sampled for this study, given that a study 10 years ago in this country had a sample standard deviation of 200 acres for farm size?
